content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Greetings Max Müller. While discussing the rental price for my apartment in Duisburg, let me begin by suggesting a slightly higher figure than what you may have expected. This well-located, newly built, and unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom gem in the city center deserves premium consideration. With that said, my starting point is [250 more than your expected maximum]. Of course, I am open to negotiating further if required, but this serves as my initial stance.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your transparency, Mister Schmidt. Given the location and condition of the apartment, I would say the rent should be a bit lower. How about we meet in the middle? [[1250] Euros will be a fair price. What do you think?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Though I find your proposal of [1250] Euros appealing due to its moderation, I must maintain my stance to safeguard my investment interests. With that being said, I reluctantly decline your offer and urge us to continue seeking common ground. Let us engage in a more aggressive reduction while preserving my expectations. How about [150 less than your previous proposal] as a revised rental figure? If this still seems unreasonable, I regretfully announce my intention to end negotiations, as my minimum acceptable rate must not fall below this revised amount.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position, Mister Schmidt. Let's meet in the middle again. How about [1300] Euros?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content:
While your latest offer of [1300] Euros demonstrates compromise and understanding, it still falls short of my initial expectation. However, to progress towards an agreement, I am willing to make a concession and accept this figure, albeit with reservation. Let us conclude negotiations here with 'TERMINATE'.
TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
